name: Windows Library Description File
summary: Learn about .LIBRARY-MS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: LIBRARY-MS files are used for creating virtual folders with collections of similar files. For example, Windows 7 creates Documents, Music, Pictures, and Video libraries by default. You can create custom libraries by right-clicking the Libraries folder and choosing New â†’ Library. When you open the new library, Windows provides an Include a folder button that you can click to add folders to the library.
